name: Overdriven Reloaded: Special Edition
summary:
Overdriven Reloaded: Special Edition 

The HD shoot' em up: vertical, fast & fun ! 
Relive the pleasures of arcade shoot'em ups in plenty of Game-Modes, 
from 1 to 4 Players in Local Co-op. 
Destroy Huge Bosses and dodge thousand of bullets ...
It's time to save the universe one more time !

7 Modes :
- Story (with 4 Difficulties: EASY - NORMAL - HARD- NIGHTMARE), 
- Arcade, 
- Manic (no healthbar for player), 
- The Line, 
- 7 Challenges, 
- 56 Puzzle-Maps ( Color-Reflex Mode / A Match 3 with bullets !), and a Boss-Rush ! 
- 2 spaceships ( + 1 unlockable), 
- 50 alien artifacts to collect, 
- 10 space cows to find, 
- 70 Xbox Live achievements, 
- Dedicated Leaderboards for all modes and difficulties, 
- A great original instrumental rock soundtrack !
